summary: Provides an implementation of the Approximate Personalized Propagation of Neural Predictions (APPNP) graph neural network layer and a training script that builds, trains, and evaluates the model on common citation graph datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed) using DGL and PyTorch, demonstrating node classification via personalized PageRank‑style diffusion.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly prototype and benchmark APPNP‑based graph neural networks for node classification tasks, facilitating integration of advanced graph learning techniques into products or research pipelines.
